resume_text:
Michael Chen
Product Manager

EXPERIENCE
Product Manager | CloudTech Inc | 2021-Present
- Own product roadmap for SaaS platform serving 50K+ enterprise customers
- Led product launch increasing ARR by $5M in first year
- Conducted 100+ user interviews to identify pain points and feature priorities
- Collaborated with engineering, design, and marketing teams on product strategy
- Improved user retention by 30% through feature optimization based on analytics
- Created PRDs and user stories for development team of 12 engineers

Associate Product Manager | StartupABC | 2019-2021
- Managed backlog for mobile app with 200K+ downloads
- Reduced customer support tickets by 45% through improved UX
- Implemented analytics tracking with Mixpanel to drive data-driven decisions
- Coordinated 5 successful product releases per quarter
- Presented product demos to investors securing $10M Series A funding

SKILLS
Product: Roadmapping, User Research, A/B Testing, Agile/Scrum, Wireframing
Tools: Jira, Figma, Mixpanel, Google Analytics, SQL, Tableau
Technical: API understanding, Basic Python, Data Analysis
Communication: Stakeholder Management, Presentation, Documentation

EDUCATION
MBA | Business School | 2019
B.S. Computer Science | Tech Institute | 2017

CERTIFICATIONS
Certified Scrum Product Owner (CSPO)
Google Analytics Certified
job_description: Seeking a Product Manager to drive product strategy and execution for our SaaS platform. Responsibilities include creating product roadmaps, conducting user research, writing PRDs, and collaborating with cross-functional teams. Required: 3+ years PM experience, Agile/Scrum, data analysis skills, excellent communication. SaaS experience strongly preferred.
